name: Wasp
origin: Janet Van Dyne, a fashion designer who gains the ability to shrink and grow wings after being exposed to Pym Particles.
powers: Ability to shrink in size, grow wings, and fly, as well as emit bioelectric stings that can paralyze or injure enemies.
events: Joining the Avengers, fighting alongside Ant-Man, and her role in various superhero missions.
enemies: Ultron, the Masters of Evil, and various villains.
